channel.title: Projects on Markus Meier
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Markus Meier

item.title: Dont Look at Medusa
item.description: Dont’t Look at Medusa is an experimetl VR – Game made in the Unreal Engine 5, focusing around the Mythology of Medusa and exploration of VR Gameplay possibilities.

item.title: Back to the Roots
item.description: This Project was made in one month as a submission for the Game Off 2023 Gamejam.

item.title: emotion gap
item.description: This is my first Game Project and what got me into Game Design.

item.title: Void Walk
item.description: The project “Void Walk” was created with the intention of exploring a situation between life and death, aswell as exploring remembering and forgetting in a bizarre story.

item.title: Card Game
item.description: This Card Game is a hobby project inspired by Inscryption, powered by Unreal Engine.
